question: What is the name of the mobile application launched by Union Government recently?
explanation: The Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment launched Divyang Sarathi the accessible and comprehensive mobile application for easy dissemination of information to 'Divyangjans'. It aims to empower Divyangjans by providing them easier and convenient access to information pertaining to schemes, scholarships, statutes, institutional. It has the unique feature of audio notes (text-to-voice conversion software) which converts written information into the audio file as well as the adjustable font.
